result.name: business-review-of-the-collection-service-brocs_1
result.notes: Daily record of payments posted on BROCS.  BROCS maintains the accounting records, issue reminders for late payment and transfer debts to  Integrated Debt Management System (IDMS) for Pay As You Earn, Class 1 and 1A NICs, surcharges and related interest. From 2013-14 all PAYE payments are recorded on ETMP (Enterprise Tax Management Platform). Updated: daily.

organization.name: hm-revenue-and-customs
organization.title: HM Revenue and Customs
organization.description:
What we do

We are the UK’s tax authority. We are responsible for making sure that the money is available to fund the UK’s public services and for helping families and individuals with targeted financial support.

HMRC is a non-ministerial department, supported by 2 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs

result.title: Business Review of the Collection Service (BROCS)
